summary: The state of Texas is divided into 254 counties.
full_text:
The Supreme Court of Texas is the court of last resort for civil matters  in the state of Texas. A different court, the Texas Court of Criminal Appeals, is the court of last resort for criminal matters in the State of Texas.
The Court is composed of a Chief Justice and eight Associate Justices. The Court meets in Downtown Austin, Texas in a building located on the state Capitol grounds, behind the Texas State Capitol.
title: Supreme Court of Texas
